full_text: Page 2808 MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-J DATE: 08/03/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 1215 1217 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 806 807 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 401 403 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1235 1237 8:30- 9:00 AM 838 839 4:30-5:00 PM 431 433 1:00-1:30 AM 108 110 9:00-9:30 AM 908 909 5:00 -5:30 PM 508 509 1:30-2:00 AM 137 139 9:30-10:00 AM 970 971 5:30-6:00 PM 540 541 2:00-2:30 AM 212 214 10:00-10:30 AM 1004 1005 6:00-6:30 PM 604 605 2:30-3:00 AM 237 237 10:30-11:00 AM 1036 1037 6:30-7:00 PM 1036 1037 3:00-3:30 AM 305 307 11:00-11:30 AM 1103 1104 7:00-7:30 PM 703 703 3:30-4:00 AM 337 339 11:30-12:00 AM 1135 1138 7:30-8:00 PM 730 730 4:00-4:30 AM 406 408 12:00-12:30 PM 1205 1206 8:00-8:30 PM 805 806 4:30-5:00 AM 435 437 12:30- 1:00 PM 1237 1240 8:30- 9:00 PM 851 840 5:00 -5:30 AM 506 508 1:00-1:30 PM 145 146 9:00-9:30 PM 915 916 5:30-6:00 AM 535 537 1:30-2:00 PM 147 148 9:30-10:00 PM 947 948 6:00-6:30 AM 605 605 2:00-2:30 PM 216 217 10:00-10:30 PM 916 916 6:30-7:00 AM 637 639 2:30-3:00 PM 249 250 10:30-11:00 PM 1049 1055 7:00-7:30 AM 706 708 3:00-3:30 PM 319 320 11:00-11:30 PM 1116 1120 7:30-8:00 AM 737 739 3:30-4:00 PM 351 352 11:30-12:00 PM 1134 1134 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DOJ-OGR-00026464

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-J DATE: 08/03/2019
Various times and signatures throughout the table

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN
